Package monsterfighter.core

Class Player

java.lang.Object
monsterfighter.core.Player
public class Player extends Object
Class that models a player

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Player(String name, List<Item> allItems)
    Constructs a player with a given name, and formats the player's inventory using the total number of items in the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String name, List<Item> allItems)
      Constructs a player with a given name, and formats the player's inventory using the total number of items in the game.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the player
      allItems - All the items present in a GameEnvironment

  • Method Details

    • getInventory

      public List<ArrayList<Item>> getInventory()
      Gets the players inventory.
      Returns:
      An 2D containing items that acts as the players inventory

      public void addMonsterToParty(Monster monster)
      Adds a Monster to the party.
      Parameters:
      monster - The Monster to be added to the party
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the players party is already full

      public void setGoldBalance(int gold)
      Adds or subtracts gold from the player's gold balance.
      Parameters:
      gold - The amount of gold that will be added to or taken from the players gold balance
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if adding the gold will put the players gold balance into the negatives

    • switchMonsters

      public void switchMonsters(Monster monster, Monster monsterSwitch)
      Given the two Monsters in party, switches them around.
      Parameters:
      monster - The monster that is to be switched in party
      monsterSwitch - The monster that is to be switched with in party
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the given monsters are not in the players party

    • partyFainted

      public boolean partyFainted()
      Returns a boolean based on whether there exists a conscious monster in party.
      Returns:
      Boolean that's true if all the monster's in party are fainted or false if there exists a conscious monster

    • getConsciousMonsters

      public int getConsciousMonsters()
      Returns the number of conscious Monster's within the player's party.
      Returns:
      The number of Monster's in party with Status.CONSCIOUS
